name: Chaos in the City
description:
U are a monkey that is angry and have to destroy all the houses in the city. I tried to remake a old retro game called Rampage. When destroying the city it creates a lot of CHAOS!

Walking is with A and D or the Arrow Keys. Jumping with Space. If you are in front of a house u can press Q to break them. The helicopter is the enemy and will drop bombs and banana's. Banana's will heal u and give u a jump boost to stand on top of buildings.

Every level is different because the buildings are randomly generated. Once broken 10 Buildings u can proceed to the next level. There are 3 levels. And an Intro and Outro.
